revised_title: Electromagnetic Tuning Forks and the Development of a Uniform Rotation Machine
tldr: This article discusses the development of a uniform rotation machine and the study of electromagnetic tuning forks. The machine aims to construct standard notes and accurately determine the pitch of tuning forks. The author also outlines a theory for the motion of electromagnetic tuning forks, which depends on the time of magnetization of the magnetic system. Experiments and calculations are presented to support the theory.
